LanguageData.ExplosiveCollar.stages.0.label: explosive collar
LanguageData.ExplosiveCollar.stages.0.description: They've put an explosive collar around my neck! I better not try anything dangerous if I want to live.
LanguageData.ExplosiveCollar.stages.1.label: armed explosive collar
LanguageData.ExplosiveCollar.stages.1.description: They're going to blow my head off!!!
LanguageData.ExplosiveCollar.stages.2.label: explosive slave collar
LanguageData.ExplosiveCollar.stages.2.description: This seems like a bad idea.
